sparagus Mhallie was a dairy goat farmer, displaced by The Absolute, and as a refugee, sought shelter in Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Asparagus was an aging human woman with wispy gray hair, dressed in a simple dress with a corset.
In the , an army assembled by the Cult of the Absolute moved from the Moonrise Towers in Chionthar Valley to menace the city of Baldurs Gate, displacing countless refugees in the process along the way. Asparagus Mhallie fled to the nearby city of Baldurs Gate with her heard of dairy goats – her girls, her family. Sadly, her girls were taken – confiscated by the Flaming Fist mercenaries upon entry to be slaughtered due to ration shortage in the city. Despite being robbed of her livelihood and beloved beasts, Asparagus was granted entrance to the Lower City of Baldurs Gate, where she was protesting the confiscations along with other farmers near the Basilisk Gate.
